dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Miliaria germanica, duytsche mylen" and "Leucae horariae, uren gaens".
Features illustrations of a compass rose and a ship.
Shows topography, drainage, territorial boundaries of the twelve tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.

6 pictorial vignettes surrounding map: [1] Sacgerias ontroeringe inden Tempel -- [2] [Crucifixion] -- [3] Affcheit Christus van syne disipelen -- [4] De bruyloft van cana -- [5] Onthoofchinghe Johannes -- [6] Christus spist 5000 met 5 brooden.
